mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ATTENDANCE
SELECT A_IDX, A_TYPE, A_TITLE, A_WRITER, WRITE_DATE, MOD_DATE, STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE A_TITLE LIKE '%다%' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
SELECT A_IDX, A_TYPE, A_TITLE, A_WRITER, WRITE_DATE, MOD_DATE, STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE A_WRITER LIKE '%#{a_writer}%' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE (A_IDX, A_TITLE, A_CONTENT, A_TYPE, A_WRITER, USER_ID, WRITE_DATE, MOD_DATE, ORI_NAME, AVAILABLE, STATUS, FILE_NAME ) VALUES (A_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{a_title}, #{a_content}, #{a_type}, #{a_writer}, #{user_id}, sysdate, sysdate, #{ori_name}, 1, 0, #{file_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET A_TITLE = #{a_title}, A_CONTENT = #{a_content}, A_TYPE = #{a_type}, A_WRITER = #{a_writer}, USER_ID = #{a_title}, ORI_NAME = #{ori_name}, AVAILABLE = 1, STATUS = 0, FILE_NAME = #{file_name}, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE A_IDX = #{a_idx}
